reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan to be a staple piece that's soft and not scratchy, with a mid-weight material that's neither too heavy nor too light.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent purchase
items.body: This sweater is made well, nice thickness to hold its shape over time. The material is soft. It fits great on a 5'4" 115lbs as a med. Plenty of room but not overly baggy. Definitely recommend for price & quality. Read more
items.author: AlanH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars great quality
items.body: soft and made well. Washes and drys nicely. Wore it to a work holiday party and got over 10 compliments! wore it with a red t shirt under, Jeans and black high boots. very festive. Read more
items.author: Loretta J. Templeton

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Yellow Cardigan for Office Wear
items.body: Pretty good for the price. Nice golden yellow color (“Amber or mustard yellow shade”). Seems like the type of material that won’t handle multiple washes down the line so it will make a good stay-at-the-office sweater. Size M fits 8-10. Length hits right below the butt and the sleeves fall mid palm which is comfy. Read more
items.author: yungdresscode

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and soft
items.body: I do love this sweater . I’m 5’1 and 150lbs and ordered a medium that fits perfectly (my weight is in my stomach, curse you menopause belly). Read more
items.author: Beverly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and soft
items.body: Beautiful and comfortable. Love wearing this. The material is of good quality. Good value for the price. Read more
items.author: Beverly Swift

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Problems after first wash
items.body: I really liked this sweater. It was true to size and the fit was just right. However, after the first wash, I noticed a hole in the neck area, but I was able to patch it up and put it away. But when I took it out to wear, there was another hole that I didn't see by the pocket. I'm sad that this happened after only the first wash. Read more
items.author: Spotfluffy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cardigan
items.body: Nice, easy cardigan to wear with a white tee & jeans. Glad I purchased it! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great versatile cardigan!
items.body: This is an extremely comfortable, nice tight knit, soft to the touch, attractive, nicely weighted, true to size, long cardigan, in choice of many colors, at a great price, that can be worn year round. Love it so much, I own them in 3 colors and plan to order more! They also make great gift ideas for friends and fam. Read more
items.author: Karen V. Wilkins

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: C- Green Bottomed Elk, B-09 Grey White Stripe, A-02 White, A-17 Rose Red, A-15 Pumpkin Yellow, A-07 Light Blue, C- Thread Knitted- Wine Red, A-05 Beige, A-11 Dark Green, A-08 Army Green, A-14 Pink, C- Thread Knitted- Beige, A-09 Rust Red, A-24 Light Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
